name: KM31-2
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Seven years after working on the chilling cases of Kilometer 31, Officer Martín Ugalde (Carlos Aragón) is called to investigate a series of cases about missing children that bear eerie similarities to those of Kilometer 31. As Ugalde investigates the disappearance of the presidential candidate's son, will he discover a sinister plan that could unleash centuries of evil toward our existence?
about_the_game: Seven years after working on the chilling cases of Kilometer 31, Officer Martín Ugalde (Carlos Aragón) is called to investigate a series of cases about missing children that bear eerie similarities to those of Kilometer 31. As Ugalde investigates the disappearance of the presidential candidate's son, will he discover a sinister plan that could unleash centuries of evil toward our existence?
short_description: Seven years after working on the chilling cases of KM 31, Officer Martín Ugalde is called to investigate a series of cases about missing children very similar to those of Kilometer 31.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
